execution_plan.description: Find product_ids that were sold more than 3 times by counting occurrences in Order_Items.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM Order_Items GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve product_id and product_description for the products identified in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_description FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.product_id);
